item.description:
Roughly 4 mile lower effort to moderate hike at Penwood State Park, with a couple of options for the route to make a loop. Some elevation gain, but nothing too difficult. Some views at Lake Louise on the ridge and an open spot a bit further on looking west. Plan to meet in the parking lot at Penwood. The hike should take about 3 hrs. and be done about Noon.

Kids can come on the hike. Pets on a leash are permitted on hiking trails.

Approximate location/directions (173 Hartford Rd. (Rte. 185), Simsbury, CT - drive in to get to parking lot on right):
http://www.mapquest.com/maps#bf22b06394bce9091131142b 

Trail map:
http://www.ct.gov/dep/lib/dep/stateparks/maps/penwood.pdf 

For more information on the Park:
http://www.ct.gov/dep/cwp/view.asp?a=2716&q=325248&depNav_GID=1650

=== Legal Stuff ===

By clicking on "Count Me In" or "Yes" or "Maybe" for this event you agree, warrant, and covenant as follows: In consideration for accepting this entry, I, the registrant, intending to be legally bound, hereby, for myself, my heirs, my executors and administrators, do waive and release any and all rights for damages I may have against any parties or persons connected with the Hartford Area Hiking meetup group for and related to the above listed event. I attest and verify that I am physically fit to participate in any portion of this above listed event. I grant Hartford Area Hiking permission to use any photographs, film or videotapes of this event for any purpose.
item.how_to_find_us: Silver Ford Escape SUV, CT plates.
